author: andy_seaborne
msg: Improved control of multiple initializations (i.e. it checks, logs and does nothing).

author: andy_seaborne
msg: Ensure a dispatcher is created and initialized before registration.
Synchronize on this in case its because of some webapp sync problem.
Seems that init() can be called again if the first fails (second call to servlet?)

author: andy_seaborne
msg: Create an InfModel when an Ontology/vocabulary is specified.
Previous created an InfGraph with an ordinary Model wrapper.

author: andy_seaborne
msg: Fixes the "8 hour" problem of server-dropped connections
(8 hours is the default for wait_timeout)
